plays.text: Goal scored by Stephane Quintal assisted by REID SIMPSON and Chad Kilger
Penalty to Oleg Petrov 2 minutes for Boarding Ray Whitney
Goal scored by REID SIMPSON assisted by Sheldon Souray and Craig Rivet
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Interference Kevin Dineen
Penalty to REID SIMPSON 2 minutes for Tripping Geoff Sanderson
Penalty to Brian Savage 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for High Sticking Geoff Sanderson
Goal scored by Andreas Dackell assisted by Joe Juneau
Penalty to Chad Kilger 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Serge Aubin 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Jean-Luc Grand-Pierre assisted by Geoff Sanderson and Espen Knutsen
Penalty to Stephane Quintal 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Tyler Wright
